creator: felix.schumacher@internetallee.de
text:
Created attachment 32631
Change links to bugzilla

The url of bugzilla changed from issues to bz. We should reflect that in our docs and sources.

Date: Sat Apr  4 18:40:19 2015
New Revision: 1671288

URL: http://svn.apache.org/r1671288
Log:
Change links to bugzilla to the new domain name (bz.apache.org)
